mapper.select: select a.*, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.description as role_description, r.create_time as role_create_time, r.create_user_id as role_create_user_id, r.value as role_value from admin a left join admin_role_relation arr on arr.admin_id = a.id left join role r on r.id = arr.role_id where a.username = #{username}
